name: list_greenhouses
description: List all available greenhouses in the system.

name: adjust_light_exposure
description: Adjust the light exposure duration for a specified greenhouse.

greenhouse_id.description: The ID of the greenhouse to adjust.

light_exposure_hours.description: The new light exposure duration in hours.

name: adjust_resource
description: Adjust resource allocation for life support systems.

name: list_resources
description: List current resource allocations for life support systems.

name: list_systems
description: Retrieve a list of all systems within the BioregenerativeLifeSupportSystem.

name: get_atmospheric_conditions
description: Fetch current atmospheric levels including oxygen and carbon dioxide.

name: adjust_system_setting
description: Modify the settings of a specific system component.

system_id.description: The ID of the system to adjust.

name: adjust_oxygen_levels
description: Adjust the oxygen levels in the system to the specified percentage.

name: check_oxygen_levels
description: check the oxygen levels in the system.

name: adjust_oxygen_concentration
description: Adjust the oxygen concentration in a specific habitat zone to a certain percentage.

zone_id.description: The ID of the habitat zone.

oxygen_concentration.description: The new oxygen concentration percentage to set.

name: list_habitat_zones
description: List the different habitat zones within the space habitat.

name: get_system_status
description: Retrieve the current status of the Bioregenerative Life Support System.

name: adjust_system_parameter
description: Adjust a specific parameter of the Bioregenerative Life Support System.

value.description: The new value for the parameter.
